statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources;
SELECT healthcare_resource_name, patient_care_demand FROM healthcare_resources;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources ORDER BY healthcare_resource_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(patient_care_demand) AS avg_demand FROM healthcare_resources;
SELECT healthcare_resource_name, patient_care_demand FROM healthcare_resources WHERE patient_care_demand > 50;
SELECT healthcare_resource_id, healthcare_resource_name, patient_care_demand FROM healthcare_resources WHERE patient_care_demand > 50 ORDER BY healthcare_resource_name DESC
SELECT healthcare_resource_id, healthcare_resource_name, patient_care_demand FROM healthcare_resources WHERE healthcare_resource_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT healthcare_resource_name, AVG(patient_care_demand) AS avg_demand FROM healthcare_resources GROUP BY healthcare_resource_name HAVING AVG(patient_care_demand) > 30
SELECT COUNT(healthcare_resource_id) AS total_resources, SUM(patient_care_demand) AS total_demand FROM healthcare_resources
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources ORDER BY patient_care_demand ASC, healthcare_resource_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM PatientCareDemands;
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition FROM PatientCareDemands WHERE care_demand > 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_condition FROM PatientCareDemands WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE availability > 0 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, availability FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE resource_type = 'Nurse';
SELECT * FROM PatientCareDemands WHERE care_demand > 10 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_condition FROM PatientCareDemands WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT patient_name, care_demand FROM PatientCareDemands WHERE care_demand BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE availability > 0 ORDER BY resource_type, availability DESC;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE resource_type = 'Nurse' AND availability < 5;
SELECT * FROM PatientCareDemands;
SELECT demand_category, demand_description FROM PatientCareDemands WHERE demand_priority > 5;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE service_capacity > 10;
SELECT provider_name, allocation_date FROM HealthcareProviders JOIN ResourceAllocation ON HealthcareProviders.provider_id = ResourceAllocation.provider_id;
SELECT demand_category, demand_priority FROM PatientCareDemands ORDER BY demand_priority DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientCareDemands WHERE demand_category = 'Emergency' ORDER BY demand_priority DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE service_capacity > 5 ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT patient_id, demand_description FROM PatientCareDemands WHERE demand_priority BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;

SELECT provider_id, provider_name, COUNT(allocation_id) AS allocation_count FROM HealthcareProviders JOIN ResourceAllocation ON HealthcareProviders.provider_id = ResourceAllocation.provider_id GROUP BY provider_id ORDER BY allocation_count DESC;

SELECT patient_id, provider_name, allocation_date FROM PatientCareDemands JOIN ResourceAllocation ON PatientCareDemands.patient_id = ResourceAllocation.patient_id JOIN HealthcareProviders ON ResourceAllocation.provider_id = HealthcareProviders.provider_id WHERE allocation_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY allocation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_capacity FROM hospitals ORDER BY hospital_capacity DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_experience FROM doctors WHERE doctor_experience > 5;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'scheduled';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_experience DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_location FROM hospitals WHERE hospital_capacity > 100 ORDER BY hospital_capacity ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_status FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE total_beds > 100;
SELECT department_name, hospital_name FROM Department INNER JOIN Hospital ON Department.hospital_id = Hospital.hospital_id;
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Doctor INNER JOIN Medical_Record ON Doctor.doctor_id = Medical_Record.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patient WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Hospital WHERE total_beds > 100 ORDER BY hospital_name ASC;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, Medical_Record.record_id, Doctor.doctor_name FROM Patient JOIN Medical_Record ON Patient.patient_id = Medical_Record.patient_id JOIN Doctor ON Doctor.doctor_id = Medical_Record.doctor_id ORDER BY Doctor.doctor_name DESC;

SELECT Department.department_name, Hospital.hospital_name, COUNT(Doctor.doctor_id) AS num_doctors FROM Department JOIN Hospital ON Hospital.hospital_id = Department.hospital_id LEFT JOIN Doctor ON Department.department_id = Doctor.department_id GROUP BY Department.department_name, Hospital.hospital_name;

SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(Medical_Record.record_id) AS num_records FROM Doctor JOIN Medical_Record ON Doctor.doctor_id = Medical_Record.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name HAVING num_records > 2 ORDER BY num_records DESC;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, Department.department_name, Hospital.location FROM Patient JOIN Medical_Record ON Patient.patient_id = Medical_Record.patient_id JOIN Doctor ON Doctor.doctor_id = Medical_Record.doctor_id JOIN Department ON Doctor.department_id = Department.department_id JOIN Hospital ON Department.hospital_id = Hospital.hospital_id ORDER BY Hospital.location ASC, Patient.patient_name DESC;
